page.title: 09Children on the Farm
page.content: Home life could not be written about without including{family pets, dogs and cats being the most popular { Working dogs}and cats are not allowed into the house, but kept in the buildings outside. Our youngest contributor, Rebecca aged 2 had Spot the puppy, whilst the older children had ponies under their care. {Childrens games}are many, often imagination and pretend, taking on the form of farming,with toy tractor and trailer, used for haymaking, leading straw, making silage clamps and planting, just as Dad does.
